news.content: I will be presenting two works at [NeurIPS 2023](https://neurips.cc/Conferences/2023) Workshops.
Our work tracking individual neurons in C.elegans using synthetically augmented data is published in [Nature Methods](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41592-023-02096-3).
Our project SmartEM, on optimizing neural imaging with real time deep learning is on the [MIT News](https://news.mit.edu/2023/using-ai-optimize-rapid-neural-imaging-1106).
Won 2nd place at the Citadel Datathon competition.
I gave a talk about our project vdm4cdm_2d at the [AstroAI](https://astroai.cfa.harvard.edu/) lunch talk.
The paper about our project SmartEM is on [bioarxiv](https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2023.10.05.561103v1).
